front.title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for CableLabs

abstract.t: This document describes the Namespace Identifier (NID) for Uniform Resource Namespace (URN) resources published by Cable Television Laboratories, Inc. (CableLabs). CableLabs defines and manages resources that utilize this URN identification model. Management activities for these and other resource types are handled by the manager of the CableLabs' Assigned Names and Numbers registry.
